label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_020
content:
## 2026-01-21 Daily Operations Summary

- Effective TB Free: 462

- Nodes Over 90% Utilization: 32

- Coldest Node Utilization Percentage: 52.8
- Utilization Standard Deviation Percentage: 13.2

#### Rebalance
- Rebalance Jobs Started: 11
- Rebalance Jobs Completed: 13
- Data Moved TB: 438
- Average Rebalance MBps: 1085

- Skew Index: 1.05

### Infrastructure
#### stor-a-20
- CPU Percentage: 78
- Memory Percentage: 85
- Disk Used Percentage: 98
- Disk Busy Percentage: 91
- Network In Gbps: 8.3
- Network Out Gbps: 7.4
- IO Wait Percentage: 10.7

#### stor-b-13
- CPU Percentage: 67
- Memory Percentage: 76
- Disk Used Percentage: 96
- Disk Busy Percentage: 89
- Network In Gbps: 6.9
- Network Out Gbps: 6.5
- IO Wait Percentage: 8.8

#### stor-c-12
- CPU Percentage: 61
- Memory Percentage: 72
- Disk Used Percentage: 95
- Disk Busy Percentage: 88
- Network In Gbps: 6.3
- Network Out Gbps: 5.9
- IO Wait Percentage: 7.4

#### meta-01
- CPU Percentage: 70
- Memory Percentage: 92
- Disk Used Percentage: 87
- Disk Busy Percentage: 73
- Network In Gbps: 3.7
- Network Out Gbps: 3.3
- IO Wait Percentage: 5.5

### Events
- Completed 13 rebalance jobs, reducing skew index to 1.05 and lowering scrub pressure by spreading hot partitions.
- Disk failure on stor-c-12 replaced and rebuilt in 7.2 hours; watched for any under-replicated objects (none sustained).
- Metadata throttling and batching reduced manifest backlog from 5.2k to 3.6k; cache hit improved above 89%.
- Quota hard blocks reduced from 5 to 4 after applying ingest caps; processed six quota increase requests with capacity committee review.

### On Call
- Shift: Ivan B.
- Pages: 5
- Tickets: 10
- Status: Stable; recovery day with improved balance and metadata backlog reduction. Capacity remains constrained; approvals for quota increases are now gated on lifecycle plans.
